data.eml:eml: The Re-discovery of live populations of Cnemaspis tropidogaster (Boulenger, 1885) (Sauria, Gekkonidae) from Sri Lanka after 120 years

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Thasun Amarasinghe, A. A., Campbell, Patrick D., Madawala, Majintha B., Botejue, W. Madhava S., Gabadage, Dinesh E., Silva, Anslem De, Suranjan Karunarathna, D. M. S. (2016): The Re-discovery of live populations of Cnemaspis tropidogaster (Boulenger, 1885) (Sauria, Gekkonidae) from Sri Lanka after 120 years. Zootaxa 4200 (3): 395-405, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4200.3.5
